firewall_issue.title: 🔒 Firewall Configuration Issue
firewall_issue.message:
It seems like there is a problem with your firewall configuration. To fix this issue on CentOS 8 Stream, ensure the following commands are executed:

1️⃣ Open the required port:
`sudo firewall-cmd --zone=public --add-port=58996/udp --permanent`

2️⃣ Reload the firewall:
`sudo firewall-cmd --reload`

3️⃣ Check the status:
`sudo firewall-cmd --list-all`

💡 Tip: Double-check the port number and ensure it matches your WireGuard configuration.

gradio_not_running.title: 🌐 Gradio Service Not Running
gradio_not_running.message:
The Gradio service is not currently running. To start it, follow these steps:

1️⃣ Navigate to the project root:
`cd /path/to/your/project`

2️⃣ Run the Gradio admin interface:
`python3 main.py`

💡 Tip: Ensure the port (default: 7860) is not in use by another process.
